skill.name: product-strategist
skill.description: Strategic product leadership toolkit for Head of Product including OKR cascade generation, market analysis, vision setting, and team scaling. Use for strategic planning, goal alignment, competitive analysis, and organizational design.

skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Pure Python script that generates OKR templates in-memory. No network calls, no file I/O beyond stdout, no environment access, no external command execution. Behavior matches stated purpose exactly.

content.user_title: Generate OKR Cascades and Strategic Alignment
content.value_statement: Product leaders struggle to align company objectives across teams. This tool automatically cascades strategic OKRs from company level to product and team levels with alignment scoring.
actual_capabilities: Generate company-level OKRs from 5 strategic themes (growth, retention, revenue, innovation, operational)
Cascade objectives to product and team levels with parent-child tracking
Calculate vertical and horizontal alignment scores across the organization
Export OKR hierarchy in readable dashboard format or JSON
Translate company objectives to product and team-specific contexts
limitations: Uses predefined templates - not a replacement for strategic thinking
No integration with project management tools or databases
Sample metrics must be provided by the user
Team structure is hardcoded to 4 teams (Growth, Platform, Mobile, Data)

use_cases.title: Quarterly Planning
use_cases.description: Generate aligned OKRs for quarterly planning cycles across all organizational levels

use_cases.title: Goal Alignment Audit
use_cases.description: Validate that team objectives properly support company-level strategic initiatives

use_cases.title: Team OKR Drafts
use_cases.description: Quickly create draft OKRs that connect to broader organizational goals

prompt_templates.title: Basic OKR Generation
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the product-strategist skill to generate company OKRs for Q1 using the growth strategy with current MAU of 100000 and target of 150000.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Level Cascade
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the okr_cascade_generator.py script with the retention strategy and export the complete cascade in JSON format.

prompt_templates.title: Alignment Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate OKRs using the innovation strategy and show me the alignment score dashboard.

prompt_templates.title: Strategy Comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate OKR cascades for both revenue and operational strategies side by side to compare how they translate to team-level objectives.

output_examples.input: Generate OKRs using the growth strategy
output: Company OKRs: 3 objectives with key results for MAU growth, market expansion, and CAC reduction
Product OKRs: Translated objectives focused on product-led growth loops and feature adoption
Team OKRs: Distributed across Growth, Platform, Mobile, and Data teams

best_practices: Customize the sample metrics with your actual baseline data before using the output
Review the translated objectives to ensure they make sense for your organization structure
Use the alignment scores to identify gaps where team objectives do not connect to company goals
anti_patterns: Using generated OKRs verbatim without adapting them to your specific context
Ignoring the alignment matrix when teams have disconnected objectives
Relying solely on templates without strategic analysis of market conditions

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Works as both a prompt-based skill and a script runner.

faq.question: How many objectives does it generate?
faq.answer: Generates 3 company objectives with 3 key results each, cascading to product and team levels.

faq.question: Can I export data to other tools?
faq.answer: Yes, use the 'json' flag to export structured OKR data for import into project management tools.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, the script runs locally with no network calls. All data stays on your machine during processing.

faq.question: Why is my alignment score low?
faq.answer: Low scores indicate objectives lack parent-child connections. Check that team objectives reference product objectives.

faq.question: How does this differ from tools like Asana or Jira?
faq.answer: This generates strategic objectives and calculates alignment. It does not track progress or integrate with work management systems.
